title: Integrated Education for Evidence-Based Medicine Clinical Application

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic medical terminology and research methodologies, with clinical practice experience
context.additional_context: Customized Training for Current Speech-Language Pathology Practitioners, Structured Around Practical Exercises Using Individual Clinical Cases

learning_goals: Learners can analyze real clinical cases and develop treatment plans applying evidence-based medicine principles.
Learners can perform a five-step process to critically evaluate research evidence in clinical settings and integrate it into practical decisions.
Learners can document and present evidence-based medicine approaches applied to patient problem-solving through team-based projects.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
